【Best Gifts】Stylish, lightweight, sturdy, dishwasher safety and reusable travel utensils set are perfect for gifts to your loved ones and those who love you. They will love these high quality practical travel utensils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These sets of cutlery are so nice and convenient to take with me in my lunch box so I don’t have to take silverware or use the nasty work utensils. Recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bonitos y Resistentes
reviews.reviewText: Están muy buenos, lo que compré trae 4 sets en diferentes colores

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the texture and spoon shape
reviews.reviewText: The fork is a little flimsy, chopsticks are shorter than normal but I actually prefer that. I wish the ends weren’t pointy but it’s not a big deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great utensil set for lunch boxes. We were using disposable utensils in our lunches every day. I bought these to stop so much waste. This was a sturdy set at a great price. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loves this product
reviews.reviewText: This was a great idea. Everything all in one. Especially since we had to return to the office and I always needed utensils. Great for picnics. Me and the BF love the chop sticks 😊. We take these when we have sushi in the park.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling n hotel stays
reviews.reviewText: By far the best set of travel along utensils I've purchased! Easy to clean, We ate spaghetti while at water country so they didn't get washed off till about 10pm which is when We got home. There was no stain left behind, No Stain!! I keep them in My car since they have their own storage containers they stay clean at all times. They don't take up alot of space and they stay cleaned, lightweight for You're lunchbag/pocketbook. The best part.... You have everything needed in 1 case (fork, spoon, knife & chopsticks) such a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I love the portability of these sets, I have one for work, one in the car, one in my purse and and extra just in case. I do not like to eat off of utensils other than my own so this makes it easy no matter where I am. Love that they are sturdy and the case is small enough to fit in my purse. Love the colors too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice utensil set, could have been more sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Overall, it is a nice set. I like that the plastic fork, spoon, knife, and chopsticks are in a box. It makes it easy to carry it. The utensils could have been a bit more sturdy, but still, it’s a handy set. I am using it for my son’s lunch box; he is pleased with his new fork and spoon set compared to sporks.
